Looks like the version you use for Eclipse, GEF and EMF does not match. From the website http://download.eclipse.org/tools/gef/downloads/drops/R-3.1.1-200509301327/index.php, it can be known that GEF 3.1.1 has a requirement for Eclipse 3.1.1 and EMF 2.1.1.

In addition, BIRT 2.0.1 may not fully support Eclipse 3.1.X, which is in the requirements section of http://download.eclipse.org/birt/downloads/, although I test the bug does not exist in 3.1.1. You can easily download a full install version in <Report Designer Full Eclipse Install> of http://download.eclipse.org/birt/downloads/.
